评论概述: I LIKE IT (warning for my below 100lb baddies)
评论详情: The material threw me off guard a little by how thick it is. It’s not that thick tho but I expected it to be see through (my hopes were not high at all💀). Anyways Im very happy with the material. Now, im part of the itty bitty community so i was struggling to keep the top part in place since it kept sliding down a little(i ordered a small), so what I did was fold half of it under the fabric(I present two pictures showing the two ways I wore it) THAT HELPED A LOTTT! anyways I can honestly just get it fixed. OH AND ALSO I expected it to be more cenched to my waist but it was kinda loose at the end. I can also just get that fixed but that’s why I’m giving this a 4! If you’re not 4’11 and not less than 100 pounds then go ahead and buy! But if you are then girl…. I mean you better know how to sew🤷‍♀️. It is a cute shirt though so I DONT regret my purchase. 💗
